ValidationRule.description: The mandatory fields for closing the case are Company ID, Purchase ID, BE user creation done, BE invitation to RP sent. RO-1760
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
ISPICKVAL(Status, "Closed") && RecordType.DeveloperName = "OnboardingCase" &&
AND( ISPICKVAL(Product_Type__c , "HIRE"), OR( ISBLANK(txtCompanyID__c), ISBLANK(txtPurchaseID__c), bUserRP__c = FALSE, bInviteToRPSent__c = FALSE ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Before closing the case make sure to fill in Company ID and Contract created.
